resources.string: Our bunny goes shopping! It has to try to buy the more expensive products to spend as much money as possible. Click on a product to kick it off the shelf so that it falls directly into the moving shopping cart. If you miss the product it gets lost. Also watch out for slippery floor. The bunny may crash into the warning sign and loose precious shopping time. Avoid the signs by clicking on them. Let the shopping begin!
Click the products to put them in your shopping cart. Choose more expensive products over cheap ones.
